content:
# We have successfully harvested 20 iron ore, updating our inventory to `{'coal': 8, 'iron-ore': 21, 'iron-plate': 45}`.
# With this amount of iron ore, we can now distribute it to the furnaces to keep them operational.

# Let's insert 5 pieces of iron ore into each of the four furnaces:
for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}):
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 iron ore into each furnace.

# After this, we will check the updated inventory and the statuses of the furnaces once again to ensure everything is functioning properly.
print(f"Updated Inventory after inserting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Furnace statuses: {[inspect_inventory(furnace) for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})]}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
